title: Mecha Sion Bug
body: I have yet to hear "All aboard the hype train" or "Unstoppable" after playing over 400 games on sion with the Mecha Sion Skin. As apreciative as I am for the great skin, I would love to see a riot member at least comment as to why none of the previous posts have been answered after SO long since the skins release. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey Dark Star Sion!

I'm actually the Rioter that worked on getting his VO in game. First off, 400 games on him, my jaw is on the floor. 

Looks like you are correct about those two lines not working. I'm going to go in and fix those up right now. I'm also going to add it so all the unique taunts he has towards certain champs/skins/groups work as kill lines. Look for it in Patch 7.14!

Thank you so much. I cannot wait for these changes! Here is my reference to all quotes in case you need the rest.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oSZofK0yiwA&t=158s
